    ExtractTrait(Gene[], TraitType)

    Extract a single trait value from the genome using the reserved trait gene region. traitIndex 0 corresponds to the last pair of genes, 1 to the previous pair, etc. Returns a normalized float in approx range [-1, +1].

    Declaration
    public static float ExtractTrait(Gene[] genome, Genetics.TraitType trait)

    Type Name Description
    Gene[] genome
    Genetics.TraitType trait
